database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: Interactome of the influenza A virus transcription/replication machinery
entry.description: Analyses of AP-MS experiments performed in HEK 293T cells infected with the influenza A/WSN/33 virus. In half of the experiments the virus was modified to contain a C-terminal Strep tag on the polymerase subunit PB2. Full details in York et al. 'Interactome analysis of the influenza A virus transcription/replication machinery identifies protein phosphatase 6 as a cellular factor required for efficient virus replication.'
